alert.note: Alert for Coke; Runnels (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 7:01PM CDT until May 07 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN COKE...NORTHEASTERN TOM GREEN AND SOUTHWESTERN RUNNELS COUNTIES... At 700 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Miles, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Rowena around 735 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Ballinger Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
